name: TLT240SCA Luxurious Clear Floor Two Post Lift(CE standard configuration)
description: Luxurious Clear Floor Two Post Lift (Rated Capacity: 4.0Ton)

name: LAUNCH Creader Professional 129 = Creader
description: Creader Professional 129 is a kind of personal diagnostic device which integrates both cars' diagnostic functions and all OBDII functions. These CRP129 series products are developed on the core component of the DPU platform with two chips DP431 and JV700 which are designed by Launch, which achieves the idea that from the perspective of user's requirement to design diagnostic equipment. They not only have the same artwork stylish appearance, but more strikingly, they heritage X431 fault diagnosis technology and cover vehicle models widely.
